definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化物包括實驗室和工業過程中常用的鹼。

sentences.english: However hydroxyl has no effect on carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，氫氧化物卻對二氧化碳毫無影響。

sentences.english: This method does not produce or require the handling of corrosive quaternary ammonium hydroxides.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法不產生或不要求處理腐蝕性的季銨氫氧化物。

sentences.english: It may also be absorbed by clay minerals and hydroxides of iron and manganese…
sentences.chinese: 它也可以爲粘土礦物和鐵或錳的氫氧化物所吸附。

sentences.english: A base is the hydroxide of a metal.
Iron and aluminum hydroxides are present in soils in both crystalline and amorphous forms.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中出現有結晶和非結晶形式的鐵和鋁的氫氧化物。
